personalMessage.title: A Message from Governor Baker
personalMessage.rte: “Mass.gov is the digital front door of government — the first place many people in the Commonwealth start their interactions with the state. In our ongoing mission to ensure that state government works better for everyone, we are excited to unveil the new Mass.gov pilot, an innovative testing laboratory to help you get the support you need and the answers you’re looking for — fast and easy. We welcome your feedback. Thanks for your help.” - Governor Charlie Baker
